KIF stands for "Kanazawa Independence Front."
Lieutenant Sachiko G. Suzumiya's short military boots that appeared in the four-panel manga series "Kanazawa Independence Front". The manga is now being published on Granzella website.\n Defensive Strength: ★[#Legal]
